entity.name: Chris Christie
entity.description: Former Governor of New Jersey, Chris Christie

text:
Former NJ Gov. & professional eating champion Chris Christie said that it’s time to re-open the country, & that “we’ll just have to accept the deaths of tens of thousands more Americans.”

“We could save more people, but toward what end?” the fatman asked.
https://t.co/gvdhtSlRbV
